UM JOGO PROMISSOR COM MODO HISTORIA MELHORIAS (POUCAS) MAS TINHA EM RELAÇÃO AO SEU PRIMEIRO JOGO 
ESTE GAME NÃO SE DEVE SER CHAMADO DE Overwatch 2  ISSO DEVE SER CHAMADO DE MAIOR BOMBA DA BLIZZARD JÁ LANÇADA COM FALSAS PROMESSAS QUE NUNCA IRÃO SER CUMPRIDAS E AINDA PAGAR PARA JOGAR MISSÃOZINHA 
POR 184 REAIS EU PEGO A DLC DO CYBERPUNK 2077 QUE DEVE SER MUITO MELHOR QUE ESSA BOMBA E AINDA SOBRA DINHEIRO DETALHE EXTREMAMENTE IMPORTANTE EU PAGUEI PELO PRIMEIRO JOGO E NUNCA VOU TER 1 BENEFICIO PRA JOGAR AS TAIS MISSÕES DE HISTORIA QUE FORAM PROMETIDAS SEM COMPRAR DNV O JOGO TORNAR ELE FREE FOI O MAIOR TIRO NO PÉ DESSE JOGO DEPOIS DE TER ANUNCIADO QUE AS MISSÕES PVE SERIAM PAGAS E SEREM CANCELADAS PARABÉNS BLIZZARD CONSEGUIU ENTERRAR MAIS UMA FRANQUIA SUA ESPERO QUE COM A AQUISIÇÃO DA MICROSOFT TODOS OS ENVOLVIDOS NESSA MERDA DE GAME SEJAM DEMITIDOS POR MENTIR SOBRE CONTEÚDOS FUTUROS E POR ENGANAR TODOS NÓS COM ESSA BOMBA CHAMADA Overwatch 2

Después de mas de 2000 horas con OW2, y jugador veterano del Overwatch 1 (ese era mucho mejor, incluso muerto)  no lo recomiendo en absoluto. Es como esa novia tóxica que tienes/tuviste y no puedes dejar. Este juego te hará quedar calvo a las pocas semanas, asique si quieres conservar tu preciosa melena. solo consume su rule34 y se feliz, de nada por el consejo :D

Don't let the negative reviews fool you. Most of them are players who haven't played the game and don't like it. This game is good.

Overwatch 2, at it's core, is a good game. It is still the same overwatch that got all the praise back in 2016. The game is fun, decently balanced, looks great, has good events en is updated regularly enough to keep being interesting. The team behind it has passion for the came and obviously care for it, even if the corporate side of ActiBlizzard only sees it as a way to make money. 

Is the monetisation bad? Yes
Is ActiBlizzard a company you should be supporting? Probably not
But is Overwatch 2 a fun game? Yes

The game is still Overwatch, even behind all the corporate junk that has been infesting it. Overwatch 2 is good, and I still recommend it.

I just wanted to say Fxxk You Blizzard. Bought two copies of origins edition back in 2016, I've done my support. Overwatch 2 is a total scam, unfinished program, it's a joke.

En su día pague 40 € como muchas otras persona, daban la opción de comprar cajas pero creo que nunca hizo falta gastarse dinero en ello porque cada nivel te daba una caja y la probabilidad de skins legendarias no eran para nada tan raras de conseguir. Mas tarde se podía conseguir créditos por cada partida que jugabas en una de las colas, en una tarde me saque unas 2 o 3 skins legendarias y eso me motivaba para seguir jugando. Y ahora van y sacan el juego gratis sin posibilidad de conseguir cajas gratis, con pases de batalla de pago que encima el 95% del contenido del pase de batalla son frases grafitis y llaveritos.. una tontería muy grande, un modo PVE de total risa, ves aquí, defiende allá y poco mas, modos de juego muy básicos y que todos conocemos. Usan mapas que ya existen del juego pero con algunos cambios y poco mas, encima paga para tener mas misiones y si juegas a la única misión que hay gratis tienes que esperar mas días para poder jugar las otras.. no hemos esperado suficiente no.. Es una pena que un juego que va tan fino en general y que luce muy bonito haya terminado así, y encima con inclusión exagerada.. pobrecitos no os sintáis ofendidos por no poder llevar banderitas de generos y más..

[b][i]«Блаженные минуты отдыха. Увы, ничто не длится вечно.»[/i] — Ангел[/b]

[b]Рекомендую только за прежнюю версию и тёплые воспоминания.[/b]

Узнав об этой игре ещё в 2016 году, я постоянно следила за новостями, изучала лор, но не имела возможность играть. У меня восторг вызывало всё: персонажи, истории, графика, геймплей, карты, а потенциал игры казался великим. Только 30 мая 2018 года моя мечта сбылась. Это было незабываемое время, когда мы собирались пачкой и рофлили в игре. Увы, не смогла вдоволь насладиться игрой и получить весь контент из на тот момент имеющихся лутбоксов. Когда силы играть вернулись вновь, вышел анонс второй части, а вслед за этим — постепенное угасание игры, редкие обновления, мизерный контент...

Как только вышла вторая часть, я зашла в неё и поняла, что это абсолютное разочарование, которое достойно лишь того, чтобы от скуки провести время с товарищами. Неудачная попытка Blizzard сделать что-то новое, то есть, то, что происходит сейчас, вызвало в душе ужасный осадок и изредка накатывающиеся слёзы. Я буду помнить эту игру в её классической версии, буду любить её, вряд ли покину в ближайшие годы, но это совершенно не то, что было раньше. 

Если бы можно было повернуть прошлое вспять...

This game has been made significantly worse than the original in order to try to force the players wallet open. It takes a real pile of digital shit to make people miss the old loot box system and trust me you are looking at one big pile of digital shit.

So... About time that Blizzard decided to bring their games to Steam and oh boy. I want to let my frustration out.
I played Overwatch for the first time in 2016 so since its launch and did quit the game around Season 10/April 2018 once Brigitte became available in ranked play. but I also played OW2 before in its first season 

Since then I kept on revisiting Overwatch once a year to see how the game was doing in hopes that Blizzard will learn from its mistakes and bring back OW to be a relevant game once more but that didn't happen.

Overwatch 1 was doing very well from 2016 until 2018 that we kept getting real new content and constant balance changes to keep the game more fresh but also solve existing problems at the time like Mercy's Mass Rez ability that was loathed by the vast majority of the player base.
Time passed on and it was clear that Overwatch was on life support with fewer hero releases and existing content being recycled like the Summer Games event for years. and at the end of its life cycle became full of cheaters as Blizzard's Warden anti-cheat solution wasn't being updated at all and was completely pointless to the point of making VAC to look like it is being actively developed.

Game Balance was never the strongest thing for Blizzard. PvP World of Warcraft players of old were already accustomed to it but I will argue that OW during its first years wasn't too bad balance-wise and there was the sense that the developers were ready to listen and accept feedback to improve upon that aspect. Fast-forward to 2018 and we get Brigitte as a hard counter pick to the popular Dive meta by introducing a hero that is full of CC in a game that is based upon movement.
While Blizzard did manage to shake the meta and introduce something new. it wasn't well received by the community at any capacity.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6zVEF3ndhs

Imagine creating a hero so broken that makes an entire role invalid due to the meta it created around the same character (GOATs) and at some point was the sole reason of why role queue was introduced into the game in the first place.

And here comes Overwatch 2, Blizzard announced that OW2 was already in development since 2019 and the original idea of the newer title was to add the story mode and expend upon the universe of the game but also gameplay by introducing different systems from RPGs like talent trees and allow the player to experiment with different options and have a system that promotes progression.

Fast forward to OW2's actual launch. the promised PvE component was completely missing and the game was far from being ready to go. worse matchmaking, less maps, removal of 2CP in general. even basic features like being "on-fire" was completely absent despite the voice lines still existing in the game and WERE LITERALLY TRIGGERED but no visual feedback at all.
Fun fact, According to the financial reports by Activision-Blizzard themselves. they are fully aware that Overwatch 2 launched in an early access state.
https://investor.activision.com/news-releases/news-release-details/activision-blizzard-announces-second-quarter-2022-financial
"Overwatch 2 is planned to launch in early access on PC and console on October 4. With a free-to-play live service model designed to provide frequent and substantial seasonal updates, this launch kicks off the next chapter for the acclaimed team-based action game."

Then we hit the final straw that made a large part of the Overwatch player base to quit for good and this was the cancellation of the PvE story mode and instead they did split the idea into "Story Missions" which are being sold for 15 euros for about 90 minutes of content at most without the talent tree or customization that has been showcased years prior.

Blizzard as a company simply cannot be trusted and doesn't deserve . if you want to get into Overwatch 2 and expecting the game to do well in the future then I'm very sorry to tell you that you will be disappointed right away.
Overwatch 2 is a downgrade with a completely disgusting monetization system that it makes people to miss loot boxes... compared to the original game that we all have fallen in love with in the past.

I would advice potential players to stay away from this game and Blizzard games in general.

Le jeu est une chimère rien de plus

Un jeu assemblé à la va vite en 1 mois quand on a vu que le PVE allait pas marcher, on ressort des tiroirs les quelques persos sur lesquels on avait taffé avant l'arrêt du suivi et ça fera l'affaire.

J'aimerais être dans le monde ou overwatch est un bon jeu mais ce n'est pas le cas. L'équilibrage est hasardeux, la direction du jeu pas claire (on se demande souvent si le jeu veut être un shooter ou non)  rien ne va passé les 50 premières heures. Le jeu semble avoir oublier que la plupart de son public aime... s'amuser. Trop de counterpicks trop de strat facile à abuse avec du reward démesuré bref pour s'amuser faut que les étoiles s'alignent.
En 2016 ça passait, c'était nouveau on faisait outre les points faible. Aujourd'hui le teamwork requis pour contrer certains personnage me paraît être un vrai frein au fun, sans parler des perso type Junkrat qui forcent le counterpick, ce qui est amusant ni pour aucun des deux joueurs. 

Dommage car les devs ont du talent mais de grosses erreurs dans la manière dont les dirigeants exploitent ce talent.

Overwatch 2 on Steam is a sad last fart for this franchise. And it's obvious since after all the effort Activision Blizzard made to force Battlenet down our throats, releasing it on Steam is clearly one desperate attempt to bump the popularity of the game among a crowd that won't even leave their bedroom to take a shower, so why would they leave steam to play this sorry excuse for a sequel? 

The game is fun nonetheless. If you never played it, give it a try. There are hundreds of hours of extremely well polished gameplay mechanics, amazing sound design, a great roster as rule 34 starter kit, and a couple of extra game modes too, really fun stuff. If you are an O.G OW player. You now the drill: Give it a shot, have a deep breath, and call suicide watch.

Overwatch 1 was a great game. Unfortunately it was removed and downgraded to Overwatch "2". The gameplay is still fun and the new characters add interesting abilities. However, the microtransactions are horribly overpriced. Content that was previously free must now be grinded for or bought. Even new characters are locked behind this system. And the new PvE content (which was initially the reason for creating OW2), is the same gameplay loop as the old archives missions. According to reviews, even the new paid story missions are the same boring gameplay loop. Overwatch 2 does nothing to innovate and only exists to show Blizzard's greed for money.
